title: [Done]parallelize elementwise operation with openmp
body_html: Most of elementwise operations of discontiguous THTensor such as copy, addition, multiplication and so on are serial with CPU backend, and the openmp overhead theshold is too high. This commit will parallelize elementwise operation of discontiguous THTensor with openmp.
body_text: Most of elementwise operations of discontiguous THTensor such as copy, addition, multiplication and so on are serial with CPU backend,  and the openmp overhead theshold is too high. This commit will parallelize elementwise operation of discontiguous THTensor with openmp.
